name: InternetInformationServerActions
description: Performs basic actions on remote IIS.
author: ggarbuglia

inputs.name: server
inputs.label: Remote Machine
inputs.helpMarkDown: FQDN of the remote machine you want to reach (or the IP Address).

inputs.name: adminusr
inputs.label: Admin Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Administrator login for the remote machine.

inputs.name: adminpwd
inputs.label: Admin Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Password for administrator login for the remote machine.
It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'.
You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: The action to perform on IIS.

inputs.name: webs
inputs.label: Web Site(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The comma separated list of web site(s) name(s) to perform the action. Leave it blank to perform action on the entire IIS.

inputs.name: apppools
inputs.label: App Pool(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The comma separated list of application pool(s) name(s) to perform the action. Leave it blank to perform action on the entire IIS.
